name: nudist city jam 1020
description:
The old man of nudist is hiding somewhere. 
If you found him, that's the end of this game.

Made in 3 days by Komitsu, Yosuke Tani, Ayana Sakurada.  

To start, click the window.
mouse cursor : change viewpoint
keyboard↑↓←→ : walk
space key : jump
If you want to quit, press esc key.
